
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53221343">
<font size="4">蛾类是鳞翅目中最大的类群，占到鳞翅目种类的9/10左右。蛾类的外观变化很多， 难以作一般描述。大多数蛾类夜间活动，体色黯淡；也有一些白天活动，色彩鲜 艳的种类。</font><br>
<img id="aimg_AqSzf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://tc.z.wiki/autoupload/-sI7-9IZdVOkxJ1svOZO6m7clPqg7oxeXBh7HThBfLKyl5f0KlZfm6UsKj-HyTuv/20250610/Uzjw/727X595/%E8%9B%BE%E5%AD%90.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://tc.z.wiki/autoupload/-sI7-9IZdVOkxJ1svOZO6m7clPqg7oxeXBh7HThBfLKyl5f0KlZfm6UsKj-HyTuv/20250610/Uzjw/727X595/%E8%9B%BE%E5%AD%90.png"><br>
<font size="4">百度 链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1nvB16giBKbs1nHLtGofj1w?pwd=2gbA </font><br>
